name: Supermemory
description: Persistent memory backed by a self-hosted supermemory API (Postgres + pgvector).

apiUrl.description: Base URL of the supermemory-compatible API

apiKey.description: Bearer token for the API (optional if API is unauthenticated)

autoRecall.description: Automatically search memory before each agent turn

autoCapture.description: Automatically capture facts from user messages

recallLimit.description: Max number of memories to recall

minScore.description: Minimum similarity score (0-1) to include a result

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Leave blank if your API does not require auth

autoRecall.label: Auto-recall
autoRecall.help: Inject relevant memories before each agent turn

autoCapture.label: Auto-capture
autoCapture.help: Extract and store facts from user messages

minScore.label: Min score
minScore.help: Lower values return more results but with less relevance
